articles.title: Flee, Mortals! Support
articles.text: MCDM's Flee, Mortals! encounter generation and monsters are now supported in K+FC. This can be found in the settings above the encounter panel.

articles.title: D&D5e 2024 Support
articles.text: D&D5e 2024's encounter generation rules are now available in in K+FC. This can be found in the settings above the encounter panel.
